name: z block
description:
z block is a 3D side view game, where you must survive zombies waves, which get heavy and more heavy.

To defence you self you can currently choose between 43 Weapons and some defence
stuff like spikes or mines and you even can cloth you player for more protection.

In z block you get exp for killing zombies for getting level up.
for each reached level you can upgrade you skill tree from more health until a bigger
magazine size.

z block offers currently 4 Bioms(Desert until a snow world) to play on and the controll is simple and fast.
